Subject: Some will question: U.S. District Judge Alison Nathan and Prosecutor's Office 
Some will question: How does America judge the degree of underage sex trafficking? 
If a wealthy man and/or organization pays for airline tickets, hotel accommodations, and food for underage 
teens to which results in the underage girls being paraded on stage in nothing more than what is deemed 'not 
much more than lingerie'... eventually resulting in some of the underage girls possibly having sex with anyone 
18+ and/or -18... possibly straight sex and/or lesbian sex, surely the wealthy individual and/or organization is 
guilty of underage sex trafficking to some degree. 
While some will argue such cases are not to the extent of underage sex trafficking such as what unfolded in 
the case of Jeffrey Epstein -both Lolita Island and U.S. gatherings, the argument of presentation cannot be 
debated, a degree of sex trafficking occurred during what is considered 'Miss Teen USA Contests.' 
There is a grooming involved within beauty pageants, is there not? The payment by a wealthy individual 
and/or organization offering various teenage girls the 'flamboyant freedom of opportunity for sex behind 
pageant doors' is surely 'a hidden secret' which has taken place, has it not? 
Had the underage girls not been offered the 'flamboyant freedom of opportunity' through the guise of a 
beauty pageant then, cases of -perhaps most likely, lesbian sex between underage girls would not have been 
given the time nor, the place for such sex vacations to occur. If such sex vacations occur then, surely it is a form 
of sex trafficking being set into place... into reality by the wealthy individual and/or pageant organization. 
While chains, threats, freedom, etc... is perhaps not a form of physical sex trafficking to which often times 
associated with sex trafficking, if sex -especially underage sex of any manner at beauty pageant gatherings, 
occurs then, this sex trafficking has occurred. 
Has anyone ever questioned past teen beauty contestants as to how many of them were sexually involved -
either with those 18+ and/or -18... with either those within and/or around the pageants... with male or female, 
during pageant gatherings? 
EFTA00024265

If indeed any form of sexual involvement occurred then, in fact, sex trafficking occurred under the guise of 
'flamboyant freedom of opportunity' presented by the beauty pageant owners. A grooming for the world of 
high-dollar prostitution is what many can potentially perceive beauty pageants and modeling shows to be. 
NOTE: Obviously, wording of beauty pageants can also be replaced with modeling shows. 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MVri5KhzFcM 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=H8czVPrRkWk 
Miss Teen beauty pageants have been places of 'underage grooming.' 
https://www.nytimes.com/2020/09/17/nyregion/ghislaine-maxwell-grooming.html
In order to help ensure Ghislaine Maxwell's day in court -not only for her and her lawyers to defend herself 
through the legal system, too potentially expose corrupt sex traffickers and, perhaps at this point, to expose the 
active participants within the deceased Jeffrey Epstein sex trafficking saga. Those active participants might very 
well be high-ranking wealthy politicians and government officials and, socialites typically associated with 
Hollywood and the wealthy circles throughout America and, the world. 
Ghislaine Maxwell's health and well-being should be extremely important to all women -young and old, in 
order to help ensure injustice is not a  continuous practice as in the past while justice is upheld even against 
those who have thus far been shielded due to political power and/or wealth. 
Such is the reason bail should be granted to Ghislaine Maxwell in order to help ensure her appearance before 
the Court and, before the Nation does not end prior in such an ill-manner of injustice to which befall upon 
Jeffrey Epstein to which many question the government's ruling of death based upon questioning any cover-up 
by those in positions of power. 
Having an individual alive for justice to be rendered -guilty or innocent within a Court of Law, is a far more 
demanding form of Law than having an individual confined behind bars -with a great risk of death for silence, 
until their day in court... perhaps eventually for the political elite if Ghislaine Maxwell is alive and well while 
finally accepting, her voice must be spoken in truth and honesty... including a forthrightness even at this point 
in time in order to prevent the freedom of those within political power and wealthy socialite houses to continue 
abusing their positions of power based upon wealth against young girls and, young women of all ages. 
Again, I petition America and, the Courts of Manhattan to grant Ghislaine Maxwell bail for the security of her 
voice... hopefully her forthright voice to be heard in court. 
Plenty of stories have been revealed around media and former contestants, Donny Trump had employees 
attempting to groom underage girls for him during Miss Teen USA pageants... as have Donny Trump and Billy 
Clinton connections with Epstein and Maxwell. 
From: Gregor Hirsch 
<AliasAlA@hotmail.com>

Subject: For the Prosecutor's Office and/or US District Judge Alison Nathan... 
For the Prosecutor's Office and/or US District Judge Alison Nathan to deny Bail Request, denial could 
potentially place the weight of injustice upon all women -both young and old, if Ghislaine Maxwell becomes 
another Jeffrey Epstein jail statistic based upon any possibility of any high-ranking politicians/government 
officials around the world and wealthy socialites seeking her silence. 
I encourage both the Prosecutor's Office and the Court to grant Ghislaine Maxwell Bail -based upon 
stipulations I have noted within previous email (included below], in order for Ghislaine Maxwell to be given the 
opportunity to take the stand -not only in defense of the charges filed against Ms. Maxwell, also those whom 
were 'protected' by the death of Jeffrey Epstein. 
Jails simply do not provide healthy environments for those Innocent Until Proven Guilty in a Court of Law... 
especially a Court Case of such magnitude which stands possibly for any and all youth deemed 'underage' by 
U.S. Law. 
Any possibly Flight Risk can be avoided based upon Bail Agreement. 
Requesting Bail be granted for the health & well-being of Ghislaine Maxwell in order 
for Court to be upheld in 
Truth and Justice. 
Greg Hirsch 
From: Gregor Hirsch

Subject: FORWARD ASAP... ATTN: US District Judge Alison Nathan 
US District Judge Alison Nathan, 
I recommend the US District Court in Manhattan accept Ghislaine Maxwell's bail application offering 
of $28.5 million... with the following stipulations: 
EFTA00024267

<24 Full-time Security Guards on premises*** [i.e. 12 guards rotating shifts every 8 hours] RV Camper 
residences on premises. 
<Each Security Guard is paid directly by Ghislaine Maxwell Escrow $20,000 monthly salary per 
Security Guard 
NOTE: Escrow prepaid 6-months in full [i.e. $480,000/month (x) pre-paid every 6-months = 
$2,880,000] 
NOTE: Escrow pre-paid prior to release on bail. 
NOTE: After six months, if additional 6-month Escrow is failed to be pre-paid, bail immediately 
revoked. 
NOTE: If Court determines 36 Security Guards, Escrow amount increases -as does number of RV 
campers on premises by six. 
<First 3-months, Hourly Skype Chat w/Court Employee of Judge's decision within 10 minutes prior to 
or, following-top-of the-hour 
NOTE: Offer a pre-agreed 7-hour sleep exclusion Hourly Skype Chat timeframe 
<Ankle Monitor 24/7/365 or, duration of Bail Term until completion of Case 
NOTE: This effort helps ensure Ghislaine Maxwell's safety based upon possible Lolita Island ties to 
high-ranking Officials... anyone connected with Jeffrey Epstein. 
NOTE: Also saves tax dollars in comparison to jail confinement costs [i.e. 10% Forfeiture of Bail 
Amount upon Court Case Ruling] 
NOTE: Based upon old-school "Innocent until Proven Guilty in a Court of Law." 
For Bail Acceptance, based upon me -Greg Hirsch, being without work and, being unable to find any 
companies interested in my CAEF endeavors, I  ask to be employed as one of the Security Guards. 
***If property still owned or, similar property, Ghislaine Maxwell pays for twelve RV campers 
strategically situated around property within 10' chain link fence around premises location at [as shown 
on Google Maps]: 
27 E Washington Road 
Bradford, New Hampshire 
NOTE: RV campers and 10* chain link fence paid in full and, set in place and, fence erected prior to 
prisoner/accused released on bail. 
https://www.google.com/maps/place/Ghislaine+Maxwell+Hideout/@43.2344341  -72.0028601  3a 75y 8
